titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Lillian F. Robbins certificate from the Regents of the University of the State of New York 1977.414
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:20:16 +0000.

did.unittitle: Lillian F. Robbins certificate from the Regents of the University of the State of New York

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of the State of New York

did.abstract: One certificate issued by the Regents of the University of the State of New York stating that Lillian F. Robbins has passed a proficiency exam administered by the Packer Collegiate Institute in Brooklyn, and has been registered as an academic scholar at the University. The certificate is dated November 1, 1872.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Lillian F. Robbins certificate from the Regents of the University of the State of New York, 1977.414, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
